document.full_text: top seed caroline wozniacki advanced to the semi-finals in indian wells thursday when her opponent, victoria azarenka of belarus, retired because of a hip injury while trailing 0-3.
document.title: wozniacki reaches semis after azarenka injury
lines_and_colors: top seed caroline wozniacki advanced to the semi-finals in indian wells thursday when her opponent, victoria azarenka of belarus, retired because of a hip injury while trailing 0-3.
